[[File:DataValuesOld.png|thumb|right|The list of Blocks and Items in [[Java Edition Classic]] and [[Indev]].]]These values apply to blocks and items in [[Java Edition Indev 20100223]], the last version of [[Minecraft Indev]]. Since versions since this have drastically increased the number of blocks and items, and removed or re-used IDs, it has its own list. Items with IDs in {{Color|#00BFFF|light blue}} cannot be legitimately obtained in the player's inventory in the game; they can only be obtained by inventory editing.
